titles: Die Veneris 15. August. 1645. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the continuance of the monethly assessement for the maintenance of the Scottish Army.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings head in the Old-Bayley,
notes: In this edition there is no comma after "Parliament" in line 3 of title and the first letter of the publisher's name in imprint is an "I" in place of a swash "J".
Order to print signed: Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Taxation --  Law and legislation --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
